vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Num.13.10;
father of: Gaddiel (H1427)
§ Sodi = "acquaintance"
father of Gaddiel, the spy selected from the tribe of Zebulun
vocabInfos._es_Definition: padre de Gadiel, espía; tribu de Zabulón
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
梭底 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "相識"
迦疊的父親, 西布倫族選出的探子(民 13:!0)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
梭底 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "相识"
迦迭的父亲, 西布伦族选出的探子(民 13:!0)
